Quickstart

This page provides a set of examples demonstrating the use of pyTTN in range of different contexts.

Ground State Calculations

  • DMRG: 1D Transverse Field Ising Model
  • DMRG: 1D Fermi-Hubbard Model

Dynamics Calculations

  • Quench Dynamics: 1D Transverse Field Ising Model
  • Spin Dynamics of an anisotropic XY model on a Cayley Tree
  • Nonadiabatic Dynamics of 24-mode Pyrazine

Non-Markovian Open Quantum System Dynamics

  • Handling Continuous Bosonic Baths with pyttn.oqs
  • Spin Boson Model
    • Unitary Dynamics
    • Nonunitary Dynamics

Using the Multiset Ansatz
